(I agree, comparing Rauq (I know it's spelled rAuq but dangit, that's not 
correct spelling and I'll never spell it that way!  Except...for what I just 
did now...dang...) to Zardus is just wrong and shameful.  That is an insult 
reserved for the lowliest of men (good thing Zardus doesn't read these posts, 
eh?).  But I have to agree with uh...Hollywood Narrator, I think that's what 
his moniker is-- *stops to watch the pigs fly* Shouldn't we vote on who the 
new Councilmember is?  I mean, sure, we'd all agree you should kick Crow Lord 
out because he's a lazy bumb.  Sure you could replace him with Azure, hell, I 
thought he WAS a Councilmember, but the point is the PRINCIPLE.  The Council 
was made to service the people.  A restriction of power and all those other 
anti-fascist gobbledygook, which is strange since a Russian from MOSCOW made 
up those rules...seems fishy to me...

<<Kyle does tend to abuse the polls more than others, and that change 
 of rules does affect him more than others, but any member of the rpg 
 who wants a poll, ANY poll, can still email it too me, and i'll put 
 it up quickly. Trillian (my chat prog) tells me when I have mail, 
 thus allowing me to hop on my comp and create a poll at any time.>>

Well, you see, there's the whole "the whole being punished because of one" 
thing I was babbling on about.  It'd be much faster for US to make the poll 
we want.  Plus if by some amazing act of whatever primitive god(s) are out 
there we make a poll that is ingenious we're going to want credit for it, 
instead of a big ol' "Made by Rauq" slapped on the poll.  

And please, United States Presidents are not tyrannical...well...the 
Democrats are but the Democrats are widely known as IDIOTS and LOSERS and 
people who mess with Microsoft and SCREW US with stock over in the long run 
and cost us hundreds of thousands of dollars because of some BS 
antitrust/monopoly case that makes me want to puke and beat the hell out of 
Clinton!  Errr...uh...moving on...if Gore was President instead of Bush, I 
doubt we would've gone to Afghanistan because those Democrats are tree 
hugging hippies, they would've just lobbed some more cruise missiles.  But 
ha, we showed the Talibs!  Oooh...I guess you getting America caught in a 
bloody ground war worked out REEEEEEAAAAL WELL, didn't it?!  HAHAHAHAHA!
 
Uh...that's about all I have to say (Democrats suck!).  It's probably obvious 
this is not as well written and planned out as my last e-mail which was 
beautiful, but I wasn't listening to Iron Maiden and Rammstein when I wrote 
the first one and coincidentally all the rage came out.  But I doubt the 
music has anything to do with it... (KILL!  KILL!  KILL!)

-Teufel
(Oh, dont' worry about not being able to remember my new name Narrator, I 
mean I'd make fun of you but I don't even know how to pronounce 
it...so...yeah...)
